sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Early Childhood Access Consortium for Equity Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Early Childhood Access Consortium for Equity Act.

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly makes all of the following findings:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly makes all of the following findings:

sections.heading: Creation of Consortium; purpose; administrative support.
sections.text: Creation of Consortium; purpose; administrative support.

sections.heading: Reporting. The Consortium shall report to the General Assembly, to the Senate and House Committees with oversight over higher education, to the Governor, and to the advisory committee on the progress made by the Consortium
sections.text: A report must include, but is not limited to, all of the following informati

sections.heading: Affordability.  The institutions participating in the Consortium and the advisory committee shall work to ensure that students have the most affordable options for advancing through and attaining their degree or credentials
sections.text: Affordability. The institutions participating in the Consortium and the advisory committee shall work to ensure that students have the most affordable options for advancing through and attaining their degree or credentials.

sections.heading: Rules.  The Board of Higher Education and the Illinois Community College Board may adopt any rules necessary to administer and implement this Act.
sections.text: Rules. The Board of Higher Education and the Illinois Community College Board may adopt any rules necessary to administer and implement this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
